author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce colloca 2,810 mld euro in p/t 3 mesi, in scadenza 2,883 mld Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Feb 28 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank announced the following results for its latest liquidity providing operation: Longer Term Refinancing Op.-Allotment Intended Volume: Reference Number: 20180017 Min Allotment: Transaction Type: Reverse Transactions Fixed Rate: 0.00 % Operation Type: Liquidity Providing Max Bid Limit: Procedure: Standard Tender Max Bids per Cpty: 1 Tender Date: 28/02/2018 11:30 Marg. Rate: Start Date: 01/03/2018 % of All. at Fixed Rate: 100 Maturity Date: 31/05/2018 Tot Amount Allotted: 2809.5 mn Duration (days): 91 Weight. Avg. Allot. Rate: Tot Bid Amount: 2809.5 mn Auction Type: Fixed Rate Tender Tot Number of Bidders: 17 Allotment Method: Min Rate (bids): Max Rate (bids): This page is updated by Thomson Reuters based on data disseminated by the ECB.
